title: Bug 32286 - ControlExample Button Tab changing styles resets button orientation
description: Bug 32286 - ControlExample Button Tab changing styles resets button orientation. Ensure that Eclipse is not running. Accept new configuration defaults.4. The buttons will change to arrow buttons, pointing up.7.
OB: When changing the styles of the ControlExample Button Tab, the button orientation is reset to the default orientation.
EB: To reproduce the issue, select or deselect SWT.BORDER in the styles group of the ControlExample Button Tab.
SR: The ControlExample Button Tab should retain the button orientation when changing styles.
